final_text: I hope your shower is always just slightly too cold.
I hope your phone charger only works at a weird angle.
I hope you always get a popcorn kernel stuck in your teeth.
I hope you always feel like you forgot something, even when you didn’t.
I hope you always hear a cricket but never find it.
I hope May every TV show you love gets canceled after one season.
I hope your socks always be slightly damp.
I hope you always type 'teh' instead of 'the.'.
I hope May every show you watch have spoilers in the thumbnails.
I hope your pillow always be warm.
I hope your earbuds always be tangled no matter how carefully you put them away.
I hope your fitted sheet always pop off the corner of your bed.
I hope your coffee never be just the right temperature.
I hope May every shopping cart you grab have a wobbly wheel.
I hope you always sneeze four times in a row.
I hope your phone screen always be just a little too dim.
I hope you always lose your chapstick immediately after buying it.
I hope your ice cream always be too melted or too frozen—never in between.
I hope May every time you try to fast forward, you accidentally restart the show instead.
I hope you always drop a nickel when looking for change.
I hope your sneakers always squeak.
I hope May every time you crack your knuckles, only one finger pops.
I hope you always spray your hotdog with mustard juice.
I hope your debit card always take two swipes to work.
I hope your allergies kick in out of season.
I hope your Bluetooth randomly disconnect for no reason.
I hope your car break down in a field full of fleas.
I hope your glasses always have a tiny smudge you can't find.
I hope your smoke alarm drain all your batteries CHIRP.
I hope May every door knob you touch give you a static shock.
I hope your voice crack whenever you get mad.
I hope May every red light last exactly one second longer just for you.
I hope you never turn right on red.
I hope you always have a high ping.
I hope your shoelaces always come untied at the worst possible moment.
I hope you overtip by 10%.
I hope Every time you use a pen, may it run out of ink halfway through writing something important.
I hope you never have the right condiments.
I hope your phone battery percentage lie to you.
I hope you do THAT for love.
I hope May every time you go to take a sip, your cup is just a little emptier than you expected.
I hope your pinky toe always poke through your sock.
I hope your grocery bag always rip at the worst possible moment.
I hope you never find ripe avocados.
I hope your belt loops always get caught on doorknobs.
I hope you stumble on things that aren't there.
I hope your ice maker always give you one cube less than you need.
I hope your grilled cheese melt unevenly.
I hope you spill a few drops of coffee on yourself before an important meeting.
I hope you always get stuck behind someone walking painfully slow.
I hope you always end up behind a school bus when you're running late.
I hope your check engine light always be on.
I hope your fork always have one bent prong.
I hope your playlist always shuffle to the songs you skip.
I hope your toilet seat always be cold.
I hope May every time you sit in a swivel chair, it leans back just a little too far.
I hope May people mistake your love for pineapples as something else.
I hope May nothing important happen to you today.
I hope you tear up every time you yawn.
I hope May the next joke you hear go over your head.
I hope May someone steal your bandwidth.
I hope your Hot Pocket… done and done.
I hope you have a 4K TV and a 720p DVD.
I hope May a friend find something embarrassing in your couch.
I hope you get a fairytale ending.
I hope your DoorDash driver be creepy.
I hope you be creative with writer's block.
I hope you catch a hangnail on a piece of fabric.
I hope you always have the wrong A-size battery.
I hope your seatbelt locks.
I hope you need to blow your nose and don't have tissues.
I hope your dry erase markers leave a smudge.
I hope your favorite mug always have just a little bit of coffee residue left in it.
I hope your phone always slip just out of reach when you're lying down.
I hope your autocorrect never learn your name.
I hope your Wi-Fi signal drop right as you're about to win an online argument.
I hope your favorite sweater always smell faintly of someone else's perfume.
I hope your fridge make that weird humming noise only when you're trying to sleep.
I hope your favorite snack always be just expired when you grab it.
I hope your alarm clock snooze button stop working when you need it most.
I hope your straw always bend at the wrong angle and stab your lip.
I hope your headphones only play sound in one ear until you jiggle the cord just right.
I hope May every book you read have the last page torn out.
I hope your car radio only pick up static on your favorite station.
I hope your mouse cursor freeze for three seconds every time you click.
I hope your toast always be burnt.
I hope your umbrella flip inside out at the slightest breeze.
I hope your favorite pen leak just enough ink to ruin one important note.
I hope May every pair of jeans you own get a tiny hole in the crotch.
I hope your microwave popcorn always have twice as many unpopped kernels.
I hope your chair always wobble just enough to annoy you but not enough to fix.
I hope your pizza delivery always forget the extra sauce you paid for.
I hope your shampoo bottle always fall over in the shower when it's almost empty.
I hope your favorite shirt shrink just enough to feel tight but not enough to replace.
I hope your weather app always predict the sun right before it pours.
I hope your socks always slide down inside your shoes halfway through the day.
I hope your printer jam every time you're in a hurry.
I hope your keyboard miss exactly one letter every time you type a password.
I hope your favorite candle burn out after five minutes every time you light it.
I hope your streaming service buffer only during the best part of the movie.
